summary: WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS BEING SERVICED, THE DEALER DISCOVERED THE TIE ROD WAS BROKEN.  (THIS WAS THE THIRD INCIDENT BY A GM AUTO WITH LOW MILEAGE)   *NLM  THE ABS SENSOR AND BEARING WAS REPLACED, THE 2 WHEEL ALIGNMENT, SET THE CASTER, CAMBER 120 CR 519, AND TOE IN TO FACTORY SPECIFICS.   *SCC   *JB
